channel.title: Server Editor All-In-One
channel.description:
Okay, so this will be my third attempt at creating an all-in-one server editor. Right now i'm creating it just for my framework, but I have created a plugin system where you can just edit an XML file, add it to the list of plugins, and voila, your server is supported. Anyways, I need help compiling a list of all available features, and elaboration on said features.
Here's what I have right now:
[ul][li]View...[/li] [list] [li]Logs[/li] [list] [li]Trade[/li] [li]Combat[/li] [list] [li]General[/li] [li]Duels[/li] [/list] [li]Administrative[/li] [/list] [li]Lists[/li] [list] [li]Items[/li] [li]Npcs[/li] [li]Objects[/li] [/list] [/list] [li]Edit...[/li] [list] [li]Accounts[/li] [li]Cache[/li] [li]Scripts[/li] [/list][/ul]
What else should I add. I now an "About" section would be nice and a control panel for offline kicking, banning, chat-monitoring, etc.
